name.baseName: Roasting and hydrometallurgy of Rare Earth Oxides (REO);Rare Earth Oxides (REO);bastnaesite route;Rare Earth Elements (REE) containing ore
稀土氧化物;稀土氧化物;氟碳铈矿路线;含稀土矿石的焙烧及湿法冶金

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The roasting and hydrometallurgy process of rare earth oxides (REO) from bastnaesite route described in this data set is used for the extraction of REEs from Bayan Obo ore in Chinese Southern Provinces, with direct applicability to the rare earth industry. It facilitates the production of REO for various high-tech applications, including magnets, alloys, glass, and electronics.
本数据集描述的氟碳铈矿路线中稀土氧化物（REO）的焙烧及湿法冶金过程，用于中国南方省份白云鄂博矿石中稀土元素的提取，直接适用于稀土产业。该过程促进了用于各种高科技应用的REO生产，包括磁铁、合金、玻璃和电子产品。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The study considered 15 different functional units corresponding to different RE metals. The assessment included three main RE production sites in China: REO production in Bayan Obo, Sichuan, and IACs. Primary data were collected for foreground production processes from Chinese and further international scientific literature, industry reports, government and industry surveys. The authors assumed a baseline for aqueous and gaseous emissions using national discharge standards for industry from the Chinese Ministry of

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 白云鄂博, 中国南方省份

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Because no primary mining data from Bayan Obo were available, LCI data in the studies (Sprecher, Arshi, Marx, Bailey (Classen et al., 2007)) are based on different data sources either from iron mining or in Althaus from phosphate rock mining. Main inputs are energy and blasting agent
由于没有白云鄂博的初级采矿数据，研究中的生命周期清单数据（Sprecher、Arshi、Marx、Bailey（Classen 等人，2007 年））基于不同的数据源，要么来自铁矿开采，要么来自 Althaus 的磷矿开采。主要投入是能源和爆破剂
technology.technologicalApplicability: The roasting and hydrometallurgy process of rare earth oxides (REO) from bastnaesite route described in this data set is used for the extraction of REEs from Bayan Obo ore in Chinese Southern Provinces, with direct applicability to the rare earth industry. It facilitates the production of REO for various high-tech applications, including magnets, alloys, glass, and electronics.
本数据集描述的氟碳铈矿路线中稀土氧化物（REO）的焙烧及湿法冶金过程，用于中国南方省份白云鄂博矿石中稀土元素的提取，直接适用于稀土产业。该过程促进了用于各种高科技应用的REO生产，包括磁铁、合金、玻璃和电子产品。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Goal of this chapter is to identify the most important differences and uncertainties of crucial parameters in the LCIs and to link those directly to the affected LCIAs. However, comparability of LCIA results shown in Fig. 4 is limited due to different LCIA methods, as already mentioned in the chapter “methods”. All LCIA results are shown in Tables S1 and S3 (Supplementary material). It should also be mentioned that we calculated Althaus' LCIA data, as he provided only the LCI in the ecoinvent database. For this, we rebuilt Althaus' original process “rare earth oxide production from bastnasite” in the GaBi software and evaluated it with two LCIA methods for comparison (Table S1).

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).
Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set, users should map the production process to the specific regulatory context of the Chinese Southern Provinces, including adherence to national discharge standards for industry. Since this data is modeled after iron and phosphate rock mining due to lack of primary data from Bayan Obo mining, users should be cautious and consider the potential differences and uncertainties in crucial parameters. This may involve adjusting inputs and emissions baselines based on actual site-specific mining data, and using consistent LCIA methodologies and methods for proper comparison and evaluation.
在利用此生命周期评估数据集时，用户应将生产过程映射到中国南方省份的具体监管环境中，包括遵守国家工业排放标准。因为这些数据是在缺乏白云鄂博采矿的原始数据的情况下，模仿铁矿和磷矿开采数据而建模的，用户应谨慎考虑关键参数中潜在的差异和不确定性。这可能涉及根据实际特定矿区的采矿数据调整输入和排放基线，并使用一致的生命周期影响评估方法和评价方法进行适当的比较和评价。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
